subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|貓妖|妖術|妖姬|妖魔鬼怪|妖氣|妖妄|妖言惑眾|妖冶|妖精|妖星|妖鏡|妖蠱|妖法|妖由人興|平妖傳|妖裡妖氣|妖風|妖人|小妖精|妖物|妖魔|妖魅|妖豔|妖言|妖術邪法|妖術惑眾|妖聲妖氣|妖祥|妖災|妖氛|妖桃|妖形怪狀|妖孽|妖媚|妖妖調調|妖道|妖怪|妖調|妖邪|妖嬈|妖厲|妖霧|人妖|妖女|生妖作怪|照妖鏡|成妖作怪|神妖鬼怪|服妖|斷怪除妖|老妖精|義妖傳|興妖作怪|降妖|草妖|賣妖嬈|墨妖|興妖作孽|妖化}}

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
* {{ja-r|妖%人|およずれ%びと}}: a person who leads others [[astray]] with their words
* {{ja-r|妖異|ようい}}: something [[strange]] and [[mysterious]]; a [[monster]] or [[phantom]]
* {{ja-r|妖艶|ようえん}}, {{ja-r|妖婉|ようえん}}: [[bewitchingly]] [[attractive]]; [[seductive]]
* {{ja-r|妖花|ようか}}: a [[strangely]] [[beautiful]] [[flower]]; metaphorically, a strangely beautiful woman
* {{ja-r|妖怪|ようかい}}: a [[monster]], a [[phantom]]
* {{ja-r|妖気|ようき}}: a [[weird]] or [[unearthly]] [[feeling]]
* {{ja-r|妖姫|ようき}}: a [[seductively]] [[beautiful]] [[princess]], a [[distractingly]] [[attractive]] woman
* {{ja-r|妖狐|ようこ}}: a [[demon]] [[fox]], [[kitsune]]
* {{ja-r|妖犬|ようけん}}: a [[demon]] [[dog]], such as the  [[inugami]] or [[yamainu]]
* {{ja-r|妖猫|ようびょう}}: a [[demon]] [[cat]], such as the [[bakeneko]], [[nekomata]] or [[kasha]]
* {{ja-r|妖教|ようきょう}}: a [[religion]] that leads people [[astray]]; [[heresy]]
* {{ja-r|妖孽|ようげつ}}: a [[strange]] [[calamity]]; an [[omen]] or [[portent]] of [[misfortune]]
* {{ja-r|妖言|ようげん}}, {{ja-r|妖%言|およずれ%ごと}}: a [[malicious]] [[rumor]]
* {{ja-r|妖光|ようこう}}: a [[strange]] and [[inauspicious]] [[light]]
* {{ja-r|妖術|ようじゅつ}}: [[witchcraft]], [[sorcery]]
* {{ja-r|妖法|ようほう}}
* {{ja-r|妖道|ようどう}}
* {{ja-r|妖術師|ようじゅつし}}: a [[witch]], a [[sorcerer]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|妖女|ようじょ}}: a [[seductively]] or [[distractingly]] [[beautiful]] woman; a [[vamp]]; a female [[fairy]], a [[siren]]
* {{ja-r|妖星|ようせい}}: an [[inauspicious]] or [[unlucky]] [[star]]
* {{ja-r|妖精|ようせい}}: [[fairy]]
* {{ja-r|妖精症|ようせいしょう}}: {{sense|medical}} [[leprechaunism]], a manifestation of secondary insulin resistance
* {{ja-r|妖美|ようび}}: [[seductively]] [[beautiful]]
* {{ja-r|妖婦|ようふ}}: a [[seductress]], a [[vamp]]
* {{ja-r|妖変|ようへん}}: a [[strange]] [[accident]], [[emergency]], or [[calamity]]
* {{ja-r|妖魔|ようま}}: a [[monster]], a [[demon]]
* {{ja-r|妖冶|ようや|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|妖艶|ようや|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|妖婉|ようや}}: [[bewitchingly]] [[attractive]]; [[seductive]]
* {{ja-r|妖厄神|ようやくじん}}: a [[god]] of [[disaster]] and [[calamity]]; a god of [[disease]] and [[misfortune]]
* {{ja-r|妖霊|ようれい}}: an [[evil]] [[spirit]]; a [[phantom]]
* {{ja-r|妖霊星|ようれいぼし|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|妖星|ようれいぼし}}: an [[inauspicious]] or [[unlucky]] [[star]]
* {{ja-r|妖麗|ようれい|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|妖美|ようれい}}: [[seductively]] [[beautiful]]
* {{ja-r|妖化|ようか}}: a [[demonic]] [[entity]] or [[transformation]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Noun
